bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Clergyman, abolitionist, brother of Catherine and Henry Ward Beecher, and Harriet (Beecher) Stowe; resident of Elmira (Chemung County), N.Y.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Journal of Beecher's experiences working for the Freedmen's Bureau in Charleston, S.C., including summaries of complaints brought to his attention. Also, two letters giving his general view of how freedmen should be treated.
